website_summaries.verdict: Fluffy as a cloud and with toys galore, baby can spend many happy hours surrounded by lights, sound, and comfort.
pros: Parents love that it comes with a tummy time pillow
babies with reflux can prop up on it
Batteries last a long time, even with consistent use
Thick enough to use on hardwood floors without extra padding underneath
Can control the volume of the music
cons: A bit on the pricey side for some
Takes up a bit of room, even when folded – and arches don't fold at all

customer_reviews.title: Large Mat! Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: My 4 year old loves to be involved and included in all things baby.. so this activity gym was the perfect option in size for him to get down there with brother. And the colors are beautiful. The quality is wonderful - very cushioned, soft and strong materials cute toys. Can't go wrong. I got the floor mirror to match now.
customer_reviews.author: rickiemarie

customer_reviews.title: ... at first but once we started using it I love it! The material is so nice and the ...
customer_reviews.text: I was first skeptical of this play gym because it seemed too simple at first but once we started using it I love it! The material is so nice and the hanging toys are so cute and fun. Great product. Skip hop was wonderful in responding to my email about their products and assuring me they are all free from chemical flame retardants,bpa phthalates vocs and lead.
customer_reviews.author: Palma V.

customer_reviews.title: I was very picky when choosing things like this, because if I am going to have ...
customer_reviews.text: I was very picky when choosing things like this, because if I am going to have infant play gyms & swings taking up space in my home I definitely don't want it to be an eye sore. I love the modern look and neutral colors (it's so hard to find items that aren't hot pink safari themed, etc) but it is still fun and interesting to my little girl. Keep in mind that the orange on the mat is neon- much brighter in person than it looks online. I also love that this mat is so soft compared to others, it makes for even more sensory stimulation for baby.
customer_reviews.author: robyn

customer_reviews.title: Not as pictured
customer_reviews.text: I put 4 stars because company deceives you with the product pics. It looks as if the mat is puffy and like clouds. It’s not! It’s flat and I was kinda upset about that. Does NOT look as pictured at all. BUT I like how soft it is and I like the pillow so that’s why it still gets 4 stars. This is my 7 week old who likes to hit the toys and kick
customer_reviews.author: D.K

customer_reviews.title: Perfect entertainment for baby!
customer_reviews.text: Skip hop line of products are my favorite. We have the whole silver lining collection. The play mat is well made, very soft and entertaining. Our 3 month old will lay under it and play with it for a while. I like that u can add or remove the attachments. I have bought some of the stroller toys in the silver lining collection and added to ours, as well as the large mirror. The pillow is nice as well. The colors are aesthetically nice.
customer_reviews.author: StephX

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Cute, gender neutral design and color scheme. First time mom who purchased based on looks, not functionality. The pillow would be great if my little one liked tummy time, but even with the pillow we have about 2.6 seconds before she becomes a banshee. At $65, it is expensive for what you get. There are better, cheaper options out there (may have to sacrifice style though). Also, mine came with visible dirt on it and therefore I had to return it.
customer_reviews.author: hope88

customer_reviews.title: Very cute, but not foldable
customer_reviews.text: Adorable and soft and the hanging toys are very engaging without being overwhelming or annoying (except that stupid sheep which belongs in the garbage - I think the one I got had a low battery so it was a few beats too slow and was extra obnoxious). BUT I assumed all play gyms folded up nicely. They don't. So this takes up a good amount of room and there is nothing to hold it together if you fold it so you just have to stuff it somewhere. As someone who lives in a pretty small house I wish I'd known or I would have gotten another one. Oh well! Baby is happy with it. :)
customer_reviews.author: krysann joye

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: So the first one we got broke the very first time we put it together. We got a replacement which was great but the mat itself isn't anything great. I love the colors and it's really cute but that's about it. I wish it was easier to fold up and store quickly too. The tummy time pillow is tiny and we don't use it very often. I wouldn't recommend this mat unless you're going for looks alone.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Great for people with hard flooring!
customer_reviews.text: I love it and my baby loves it! It's perfect for anyone that has hard flooring such as hardwood or tile. It's very plush!
customer_reviews.author: Amanda Bergquist

customer_reviews.title: Good quality, neutral tone play gym with good padding
customer_reviews.text: Initially I thought this may would be too large but at 4 months it is now the perfect space for my daughter to roll around. I wish the sheep and star had replaceable batteries and that the sheep played for a bit longer but I suppose they would be easy enough to replace once the batteries die. The neutral colors are also nice since we keep this in our living room it. Also would be good for either a boy or girl. The cloud side is a little hard for tummy time early on but again by 4 months she has grown into it and the plush mat is nice padding vs and obstacle for her now.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: The cutest activity gym ever!
customer_reviews.text: Honestly, most activity gyms serve the same purpose. I had to have this one because it is just adorable, and I am so glad I did! It has a larger mat than most, and every hanging toy has a special feature (lights up, plays music, mirror, etc). My baby loves it and it has helped a lot for tummy time. The material is so soft, it was easy to assemble and machine washable....which is a total win with a baby!
customer_reviews.author: Lisa Alfaro

customer_reviews.title: Our baby enjoyed it
customer_reviews.text: So, everyone keeps saying it's unwashable, but we machine wash ours on cold and lay flat to dry and we haven't had any issues. We bought a "open box" one on amazon so the cost was way more reasonable (otherwise I wouldn't have bought it because it's very expensive). My reason for one less star is now that my kid is too big for it, trying to store it is absolutely ridiculous. You can't even put it in big storage plastic tubs because the arches are too long.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Langley

customer_reviews.title: Unique, pretty and efficient!
customer_reviews.text: I cannot express how much I love this thing. Its pretty until its covered with spit up and drool but then it washes up great in the washing machine! My baby likes grabbing the hanging drops from the cloud and the light up star goes right into her mouth. She loves the sun mirror. I like the little cloud to prop her up a little bit too. The robin rattle and the lamb seemed useless. The lamb's music is very very slow and tinny sounding.
customer_reviews.author: Melody M.

customer_reviews.title: Love this playmat
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his playmat. It's really cute, I love that it's softer colors, the toys you can hang above baby are interactive, plus you could switch out the hanging toys too with others you may have to keep your little one from getting bored. It comes with a cute little cloud pillow too that you can use for tummy time. The material is nice and soft, it's well made and dutable. I kind of wish I had a giant one in my size to lay on haha! All in all a great playmat.
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Jefremow

customer_reviews.title: Definitely recommend this
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves this. Plenty to look at, listen to, and touch with different textures and sounds. She has been enjoying it since month 2 and it has met her needs with each stage. She loves tummy time on the cloud pillow and can focus on all the different hanging toys. Cleaning is fairly easy but takes a little while to dry. I love that it’s neutral but still baby-ish. And you can clip any toys to it to mix it up for your baby.
customer_reviews.author: Corinne

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this play mat. The colors are beautiful, modern, and soft with a slight pop here and there. I did read that some consumers were complaining that the colors were mistaken for orange when it was actually “hot pink” this is NOT true. The orangish pinkish color is indeed coral which is very much gender neutral. The mat itself is extremely soft, and I love how it transitions from one texture to another.
customer_reviews.author: Meeshee

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality hanging toys
customer_reviews.text: I would have given this product 5 stars initially but there are some imperfections with it. One of the plastic rings is broken and won’t hold the hanging toy the other is formed wrong and won’t close so the toy falls out constantly. It is very soft and plushy
customer_reviews.author: Danielle

customer_reviews.title: Cute playmat
customer_reviews.text: I really like this playmat. It's cute, and has various textures on the mat for the baby to feel. The hanging toys all do something different, one plays music, one has a rattle, one has a mirror, etc. And sometimes I just hang other toys, too. My baby enjoys the mat and the toys, and it allows me to set him down in any room and keep him entertained while I clean or whatever. I also use this mat for tummy time.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Brigham

customer_reviews.title: Very beautiful but boring
customer_reviews.text: This play mat is very beautiful don’t get me wrong but I feel like it’s lacking in “fun”. The colors are very dull and doesn’t engage my 5 month old anymore. I’ve had this since she was 3 mos old and she doesn’t use it anymore so for the price I didn’t get much use out of it. She does enjoy the toys but I’ve taken them off the rings for her to just play with on a blanket.
customer_reviews.author: Noelani Soroten

customer_reviews.title: Cute but broken attachment
customer_reviews.text: Great colors--not too obnoxious to have around the house. Super soft material. Nice contrast. However, the star attachment that's supposed to light up did not work. There's no way to replace a battery or anything. Disappointed by that.
customer_reviews.author: Bailey

customer_reviews.title: LOVE.
customer_reviews.text: I love the looks of this activity gym! My son likes the toys. It's not over-stimulating with too much color, noise-makers, or flashy lights. We've had a couple small pee accidents out the diaper, and it was easily cleaned with just a wipe. The cloud section is nice and plush for my little guy. I would recommend it ten times over!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Overpriced for what it is and not as good as others
customer_reviews.text: Over priced for what it is. Very cute and soft however my 4 month old son loves his piano Fisher Price Mat way more than this one because he can kick it and it makes noise. Plus when he sits unassisted the keys flip up so he can play it like a piano. I wish I wouldn't have wasted money on this.
customer_reviews.author: Zazey1

customer_reviews.title: Very cute!!
customer_reviews.text: I got this for our 3 month old son and couldn’t be happier! I had some issues with delivery, but nothing that Amazon did wrong. This playmat is so cute and soft! I love that the toys that dangle play music and light up. I’m very happy with this purchase and it doesn’t get any better that I got this as a Cyber Monday deal! Thanks Amazon! You continue to keep me as a happy customer! :)
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves her mat!
customer_reviews.text: I love the neutrals and bright pops of color on this mat. I feel like it’s gender neutral and we could use it for our next baby. We got this for our daughter at 2 months for tummy time. I love the cloud pillow that comes with the mat, it’s so soft, and helps lift her up so she can see more. I feel like she loves looking at and grabbing the toys. The mat seems durable, and it has been fun watching her lean to roll on this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Rschilling112

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my baby when she was 2 months old and she's 5 months and still loves it. It comes with quite a few toys but I added more she really enjoys the light up star. The only bad thing I can even say about this is the lamb you on mine worked but it sounds pitiful like the battery is going out so I just added more musicals ones instead. But if you like stars and clouds theme this is a good buy and very soft!
customer_reviews.author: Autumn

customer_reviews.title: Excellent for a busy body baby.
customer_reviews.text: This baby gym has such toys for babies to be able to work on their fine and gross skills. The soft bright colors mixed with the different shades of gray and white clouds make it so the gym not too busy a design and overwhelming to baby. It’s also very easy to clean. If you desire to remove the tags, make sure you extract them carefully so as not to rip any of the stitching open.
customer_reviews.author: J. Ogan

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with the purchase,expectation 9/10
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this skip hop silver lining baby gym after I was disappointed by my previous purchase for another brand. I was looking for a large and fluffy mat, and this didn’t disappoint me at all. I love the balance of neutral and bright colors and i could assemble it in no time. I was a little hesitant for the price but when I see the product I think it’s worth every penny. Yet to see how the baby likes it or not and how easy is to clean. But for now I am loving it .
customer_reviews.author: Aarvi S.

customer_reviews.title: More for mom/baby decor obsessed mom
customer_reviews.text: This is SO cute, I couldn't resist. It's totally not worth the money because the baby will only use it for a short period of time!! You can get the same concept for a fraction of the cost. But did I mention it's super cute?
customer_reviews.author: Eva Tsang

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT! So SOFT!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 7 week old. We have hardwood floors and this is so plush and soft! He has been laying on it all morning just looking around, he LOVES it!! He loves the sounds and all the toys. Very happy with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Birdy

customer_reviews.title: She loves it! Nice soft padded mat and fun play toys
customer_reviews.text: We love this! I bought it when she was 2 months and she really started playing and cooing on this. The mat is nice and soft if you have a hard floor. It does take up space and isn’t the easiest to disassemble if you don’t mind it being put together it’s perfect!
customer_reviews.author: TW

customer_reviews.title: Awesome quality product that is reasonably priced
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product because I am not all about every single item being BRIGHT CONTRASTING colors. The things that come with it are adorable and play music or light up. The pad itself is soft and thick so baby isn't laying on hard ground. You can turn baby in many directions and it gives lots of entertainment. We also used it for tummy time and she adored it.
customer_reviews.author: Kate

customer_reviews.title: Great and comfy playmat. Sound is a bit weird though
customer_reviews.text: Baby and big sis love lying on it and playing with it. It looks adorable and I love that it is gender neutral. The little toys are adorable. The only thing that isn’t so great is the sound from the lamb. It’s sounds highly robotic. And the melody seems a bit off. It’s supposed to be “you’re my sunshine, my only sunshine” but it plays slower than I’m used to singing it to my kids.
customer_reviews.author: Elendil

customer_reviews.title: Would buy again, actually did buy a friend one
customer_reviews.text: This is the cutest and most padded play mat I found anywhere and I'm a researcher. the only con is that you can't remove the material from the arches to wash it. I have dogs, cats and a toddler who seem to rub against and hang on to the arches which leaves them dirty. the rest i have washed several times and it has held up and is like new. my friend loved mine so much she requested one for her shower
customer_reviews.author: HDWEST

customer_reviews.title: Really love this
customer_reviews.text: It's simple. It doesn't fall on the baby. The pieces it comes with are cute. Although the one that lights up I wish it lit up a little better. It's very soft. Machine washable. Out of all the things on the market I really am glad I picked this one
customer_reviews.author: julieTop Contributor: Baby

customer_reviews.title: It didn’t last. Falling apart.
customer_reviews.text: I love pretty this is. I hate toys that are bright and crazy. However I’m so disappointed I can’t return this after buying it 6 months ago and after only using it for 4 months I’m having issues. The picture shows what’s wrong. The seen has come apart and I’m afraid the plastic pole dowel will come out. I’ll have to see if I can “fix” myself.
customer_reviews.author: Faith

customer_reviews.title: Cute and functional
customer_reviews.text: I received a fisher price activity mat from my baby shower. My daughter out grow it by 2 months old. This activity mat has a lot more room and is softer. My daughter loves it. The cute little cloud pillow makes tummy time less torturous.
customer_reviews.author: Crazycutehead

customer_reviews.title: Definitely a good buy
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this playmat. He can grab the toys and bring them to his mouth which he loves. He’s entertained for quite a while and I love it. My only thing is that after a few months of light use, the plastic that keeps the cross above him wrapped in material pokes through. A lot like underwire poking out of a bra. Other than that, this was definitely worth all the money I paid for it.
customer_reviews.author: Brianna Segura

customer_reviews.title: So plush and good quality
customer_reviews.text: Really plush. Love that this has pillows built into it so you can recline the baby a bit. As opposed to other play mats that only allow the baby to lay flat. Was a gift for a newborn who can use it in a few months. Babies mom loves it
customer_reviews.author: Forlornmyth

customer_reviews.title: Great product & size!
customer_reviews.text: My 2 month old loves it! Great quality and size! Color scheme is perfect and the theme. Heavily into Star Wars and the color grey so it meshes perfectly. Only downside is that it doesn't fit into his crib. I lay it out on my bed. It's super comfy and comes with a lot of accessories!
customer_reviews.author: Andrea K. Acevedo

customer_reviews.title: Love this play mat!
customer_reviews.text: This play mat is a bit larger than I thought it would be which make the price even more worth it. Beautiful colors and fun textures and sounds to engage baby’s senses, toys are easy to attach and remove, I love Skip Hop products and they didn’t let me down with this one
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey McBride

customer_reviews.title: Minion approved. Great product, game changer
customer_reviews.text: This will change your baby floor game for sure. The softness, geez so soft This might be made from harvesting actual clouds not sure how. Maybe a shrink ray is involved.
customer_reviews.author: JUSTIN ROBERTSON

customer_reviews.title: So cute and well made!
customer_reviews.text: I love this play mat! The colors are so trendy and cute, the star flashes lights and the cow plays music (you are my sunshine). Our dog walks over it on a daily basis, so I’ve washed the mat several times and it still looks brand new. My baby girl learned how to roll over on this mat! Highly reccomend!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Joyce

customer_reviews.title: So soft and fluffy. I LOVE the cloud theme!
customer_reviews.text: This is a must!!! Its so adorable & omg the lil cloud pillow is so perfect for my baby, love that each toy is very different, she never gets tired of them. The mat is so soft and thick and comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Kassandra

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Overall I like it along with my 4 month old daughter. The toys are kinda high for her she can't reach much yet. The pad is great tho very well made and very soft. Could be a little cheaper it's kind of an investment!
customer_reviews.author: Jill

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: What I love about this playmat is: The size. Not too big but still big enough to play on. It's soft and cushy. Not only does it come with a pillow, the whole cloud part of the mat is especially soft and cushy. The colors and theme are adorable. I love the pop of neon orangy coral color. I don't think the pictures do it justice. My baby loves it! I've washed it on gentle cycle a few times and it holds up great! The toys are great, the colors and patterns are really cute, interesting and modern.
customer_reviews.author: Nicholas Buiter

customer_reviews.title: Very uncomfortable
customer_reviews.text: Absolute bad quality. Not worth $60. No padding added. Feels as hard as the carpet it’s put on. Not at all comfortable. Good concept product. Bad quality. Had to put comforter under it.
customer_reviews.author: Bofolaver Mbuntum

customer_reviews.title: SUPER SOFT AND ENTERTAINING FOR BABY
customer_reviews.text: My 3 month old loves this gym! She can spend up to an hr in it before getting mad. IT is super soft and thick which is ideal for a hardwood floor. Every toy does something different which is also beneficial to hold baby's attention. Highly recommend and this mom approves
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So happy with the purchase!
customer_reviews.text: We were using the other play mat which was thin and I was scared that my baby can injure herself every time she turns to sides. This play mat is amazing, nice thickness, easy to assemble, nice toys. My baby loves it!
customer_reviews.author: Chimnaz

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely perfect
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely LOVE LOVE LOVE this mat and so does my baby girl! It’s absolutely adorable and it’s so soft. There are interactive things for the baby to play with and it’s fant for tummy time. I would recommend this to any new mommy out there!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Catherine Trent

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: I love this and so does my little one. It's super soft and comfy and the colors are great. I don't love the super colorful baby stuff, this is much more my style. My four month old has been really into this for a month now, he loves grabbing at the hanging stuff. Keeps him very entertained.
customer_reviews.author: Alice Hochstrasser

customer_reviews.title: My baby loves it
customer_reviews.text: Disliked the sheep (I found the sound annoying). I just replaced it with one of our other toys. Easy to change out/rotate toys. My baby loves the cloud the most.
customer_reviews.author: Jessie James Boyd

customer_reviews.title: I like the option to add extra items if wanted and ...
customer_reviews.text: So thankful we found this activity center that's both entertaining for our 8wk old, but stylish as well (all too often, baby items never match the decor). I like the option to add extra items if wanted and the fabric is extremely soft. We washed it upon arrival and it air dried with no changes of color, texture and it didn't split at the seams. Highly recommend this product!
customer_reviews.author: Jessica F.

customer_reviews.title: So soft and cute
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute and it fits in well with my living room. I knew baby stuff was going to be everywhere so it was important to me to be able to find things that didn’t stand out like an eyesore. This is perfect. My son loves the softness and the hanging toys. I haven’t tried to wash it yet but I’m sure that day will come. Says spot clean only but eventually I will try it on delicate cycle.
customer_reviews.author: Krystina

customer_reviews.title: Great size, soft, and comfy, but not for small spaces
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this activity center! My 3 year old can lay next to his 2 week old sister and play with her and talk to her on this. It's great for bonding :) she's too young to really enjoy it yet but I love that it's soft and simple and doesn't play that awful loud music that I remember from my son's kick piano mat.
customer_reviews.author: CharityLMG

customer_reviews.title: Mom+Baby approved
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my nephews first Christmas, he’s almost 3 months old and seems to really like it. Mom loves it! And it’s not as jarring color wise as some of the competitors. It fits perfectly in his grey nursery and isn’t an eye sore in the living room. Baby liked the lights and sounds it makes and stares at it for hours.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cute
customer_reviews.text: Cute play mat for baby. Lots of toys that do different things like light up, rattle, and play music. This is thick enough that my litttle guy will now lay on our hard wood floors and play on this. That was my main need as a blanket just wasn’t cutting it for softness and cushion.
customer_reviews.author: KC

customer_reviews.title: Not so well
customer_reviews.text: My child had absolutely no interest. Way over priced. Nothing there that got my son looking at. Just plain.
customer_reviews.author: Honest review

customer_reviews.title: Built very well and secure.
customer_reviews.text: Built very well and secure. Nice pops of color. Our new granddaughter isn't quite 2 months old yet, but she does see the different clouds. We feel the activity gym is safe and will have no worries when she is big enough to play with the various hanging activities.
customer_reviews.author: Vickie d

customer_reviews.title: Super cute and easy to wash
customer_reviews.text: This is so cute, even so my cat is always sleeping on it 🙄. He gets his dang hair all over it but I just vacuum it and it comes right off. I have thrown it in the wash once and it didn’t damage it either. My son loves it. One toy squeaks, the other plays music and there is a mirror on one. I will be gifting this for my friends baby shower also.
customer_reviews.author: Abigail Diamond

customer_reviews.title: Cute and very plush
customer_reviews.text: My 4 month old enjoys this very much. It’s super soft and the toys are lovely. It’s a rather large mat which I appreciate since baby and her 4 year old sister can also fit comfortably for playtime.
customer_reviews.author: Abby A.

customer_reviews.title: Great activity gym
customer_reviews.text: Great activity gym. My little guy loves this. I also love that it's not over the top colorful. My only con would be that the toys could hang a little lower for him to grab but so far it seems to entertain him! The cloud is super comfy as well.
customer_reviews.author: Shelsea Kuber

customer_reviews.title: Expensive
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to clean, assemble & is soft. I also love the neutral colors which actually don’t clash with my living room. My only complaint is that it is rather expensive for what it is. I unfortunately made this purchase before the decrease in price. However, even with the lower price, it’s a lot of money for a few toys hanging above lo’s head.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth ~Las Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic play mat!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased another play mat and was not happy with it because it wasn't soft, the toys were hard plastic and the colors were so loud to look at. So I searched for an another option and found this mat. It is great! My daughter has been playing on it every day for three months now. The cloud is soft so now that she is rolling it provides cushioning. The toys are soft but interesting to keep her attention. And it is not painful to look at in my living room. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: Way more beautiful in person and larger than I imagined which is amazing! The colors are gorgeous together and the little additions to the toys such as lighting up and making sound is so awesome!
customer_reviews.author: Heather

customer_reviews.title: Nice
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son. It had one lamb that plays a tune, the star lights up two different lights, a mirror, a cloud with rain drops. My son was holding on to this one today, he’s about 10 weeks old, he seems to like it so far.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Sebera

customer_reviews.title: Softest ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: Cute. New baby loves it so much. Soft for tummy time.just have to actively keep my cat off. Lol
customer_reviews.author: Sarah W

customer_reviews.title: I love the size of this
customer_reviews.text: I love the size of this! It's not huge to take over your whole house but enough room for the baby to have lots of fun on. It is super easy to set up. I've had a few that seems to take a whole day to set up. It has fabric (ribbon) to be able to hang the toys at any point on the arches.
customer_reviews.author: tjhalley

customer_reviews.title: Love it but baby can rip toys off easy
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and toys, the plush mat, the only thing you have to watch out for is the toys are easy to pull off. Since they are plastic shower rings they easily slip out of the latch.
customer_reviews.author: Kristin

customer_reviews.title: Love this
customer_reviews.text: I love this and my baby does as well. She’s 4 months and has been using it since 2 months. She loves looking up at the hanging toys. The mat itself is super soft and comfortable for her. The colors are so eye catching and attractive. Very spacious mat as well!
customer_reviews.author: Tearra Isoldi

customer_reviews.title: Adorable!
customer_reviews.text: I love this! Totally unexpected surprise whenever I realized it had a music feature. It’s extremely soft and plush and seems to be put together well! It’s easy to assemble, although admittedly awkward to try and fold back up into its original box. Gender neutral (we do not know the sex of our baby yet) so that’s a huge plus! Overall very excited to use this!
customer_reviews.author: Kara

customer_reviews.title: Love this, it is adorable
customer_reviews.text: Love this, it is adorable, soft, cute lovely colors. My son loves this. I love that all of the little hanging stuffed toys has something unique about all of them and something special that they do. Very cute.
customer_reviews.author: Rebecca R.

customer_reviews.title: A must have!
customer_reviews.text: I love the way it looks and she loves all her toys, it’s bigger than most playmates and leaves room to grow. At 4 months she can take her naps here, and roll all around. While smiling and talking to the happy cloud 😂
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth Y

customer_reviews.title: Cute and easy to clean and fold and store away.
customer_reviews.text: Cute and easy to clean. My daughter loves it. The toys are just so adorable and interactive. The only one I didn't like was the sheep because the tunes it made sounded a bit bad to me but all I had to do was slide another toy on the circle hooks provided.
customer_reviews.author: Dakota

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item for my baby. Baby plays on it everyday. Extremely happy with play mat!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Shuggs Mom

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: For the price of this you’d think the quality would be better. The stitching was already undone when I took it out of the box.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great baby gym
customer_reviews.text: I think thus baby gym is great for my newborn. He likes to hit the hanging clouds and stars. The color scheme goes well with grays and whites.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Modern and adorable
customer_reviews.text: What a nice play mat for my baby. Doesn’t clash with anything in my house and it’s still cute and kid appropriate.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa J

customer_reviews.title: Soft for baby soft on eyes
customer_reviews.text: My baby loves it and it’s soft on the eyes. Great neutral palette.
customer_reviews.author: Yehudis Davidson

customer_reviews.title: Granddaughter LOVES it
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for new granddaughter.... she loves it. Her Mommy loves the color tones and cloud, sun, moon etc design. So far, excellent quality,
customer_reviews.author: L. Shep

customer_reviews.title: Great playmat
customer_reviews.text: Our little girl loves the toy that lights up! Very easy to assemble as well
customer_reviews.author: Sara W

customer_reviews.title: Really cute
customer_reviews.text: Love the neutral colors and adorable clouds! Perfect for a gender neutral gift!! Love the little cold tummy time pillow included. My son loves this mat.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa A Morandi

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and soft for babies with weak necks so they don’t hit their heads hard! Loved the look, very entertaining. Compared to other similar items of the same price, you’re gettign a great deal with the size, softness, toys and style!
customer_reviews.author: jacquelyn rose

customer_reviews.title: Durable, yet super soft
customer_reviews.text: Love the accessories and the softness of the play mat. It is very durable. Lots of spit up has gotten on it and with machine washing there has never been stains, nor does the washing machine seem to damage or wear down the fabric. Older sibling plays rough with it, and the arches are still in great shape. Highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Johnny

customer_reviews.title: But it's adorable and my kid loves it
customer_reviews.text: This is crazy big. Insanely big. It takes up huge portion of the floor. Additionally, half of it is not padded enough for tile floors. But it's adorable and my kid loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Burkel

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality
customer_reviews.text: My 5 mo plays with this pretty much all day! It's super soft and comes clean really easy even with my son's severe reflux. We did have to add more toys, though.
customer_reviews.author: Kira Blair

customer_reviews.title: Non stimulating even though it looks good and neutral
customer_reviews.text: Looks good but not colorful enough , baby doesn’t seem interested at all in it . He is 11/12 weeks old
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good baby gym
customer_reviews.text: Very pretty and relatively easy to put together. Toys include mirror, one with lights, one with sound, and a rattle. Colors are muted, there could be more of the reds/oranges to help baby see.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So cute and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter used this for the longest time!! It’s so easy to clean, is so cute, and crazy comfortable!! Will definitely be using this for years to come.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Kaufmann

customer_reviews.title: Makes tummy time more enjoyable!
customer_reviews.text: This mat has made tummy time a lot more enjoyable for my baby! Super soft, great toys that can clip off and be played with, and machine washable.
customer_reviews.author: Carissa Davis

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and fluffy
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommended this playmat I all around love it. It's soft and fluffy as it seems to be. Love the colors. I literally promote skip hop items in my baby Facebook group.
customer_reviews.author: Paige LaCoste Renard

customer_reviews.title: Looks cute and baby loves it!
customer_reviews.text: I got this because I wanted a play mat that wouldn’t be super ugly in our small home! Some of these baby products can be eye sores lol. This is perfect and my baby loves to play on it. 💛
customer_reviews.author: Savannah Lewie

customer_reviews.title: Music stopped working after only 2 weeks 😭
customer_reviews.text: I love that the mat is soft and comes with a plush pillow to offer baby support. However the hanging musical sheep toy that plays music stopped working after only 2 weeks and there’s no way to replace the battery. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Joel B. Ginsberg

customer_reviews.title: I love this product
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. High quality, soft and adorable. My package was lost and after contacting Amazon, they promptly sent me a replacement without any hassle. I love how mellow the colors are and how open it is for my baby to crawl out any which way.
customer_reviews.author: Natasha L.

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty! Love the prints!
customer_reviews.text: One of the nicer playgyms I’ve seen as far as colors and prints. The cushion is super soft and the little hanging toys are entertaining. Would highly recommend to other parents!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren S

customer_reviews.title: Definitely cute, but not worth the money. There ...
customer_reviews.text: Definitely cute, but not worth the money. There are plenty of cute play mats out there for half the price!
customer_reviews.author: aspen capers

customer_reviews.title: Cheap garbage.
customer_reviews.text: Pros: It's big Cons: Low quality. We've had it a few weeks and the tent pole popped through the bottom of one of the arms. Buy the Infantino or Bright Starts instead. Our Bright Starts has taken a beating and is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It nice...but make sure everything is working properly..😰
customer_reviews.text: The musical sheep was not working, baby just turned 3 months and first time using, only to discover the sheep doesn't sound as stated...
customer_reviews.author: D. B.

customer_reviews.title: Lovely gym
customer_reviews.text: This is the first playing gym or toy for my baby girl and she absolutely loves it. She is 3 months old and she is always under the gym talking to the star and trying to grab the rattle and cloud! Love it
customer_reviews.author: Jasdeep

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this playmate! It is colorful, filled with activities for my son, and easily cleaned.
customer_reviews.author: KAS90

customer_reviews.title: Pretty. But not as functional as I’d like.
customer_reviews.text: I love the look of this product, but the bars don’t have hooks for the toys to hang. They’ll slide around unless you leave the plastic packaging on that reinforces them. In the past, I’ve had activity mats that had hooks sewn in for toys. Disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Becky Harris

product_meta.title: Skip Hop Silver Lining Cloud Baby Play Mat and Infant Activity Gym
product_meta.description:
Color:Activity GymFabric & Care • Place mat flat on floor with pattern facing up, and place arches on top • Select any white clip (at ends of each arch) and insert it into the nearest corner slot on the mat • Reach under mat and attach to the matching white clip on the bottom of the mat • Repeat on opposite corner of the mat to complete one arch, then twist arches into an X and repeat with second arch • Requires assembly by an adult • Activ.ity mat and tummy time pillow should not be placed in crib or playpen • Use this product only on the floor • Never leave baby unattended on mats.

BRAND STORY
By Skip Hop
feature_bullets: Every Cloud Has A Silver Lining And This Dreamy Baby Activity Gym Is No Exception Offering Hours Of Plush Playtime Made To Stimulate A Baby's Sight, Hearing, And Touch
Developmental Activities Include: Musical Sheep Toy That Plays A Cheerful Tune, Colorful Led Light-up Star, Cloud Squeaker, Bird Rattle And Baby-safe Sunshine Mirror
Large Oversize Playmat That Offers Cushiony Comfort And Multiple Textures For Infants Sensory Development Along With A Soft Color Palette To Compliment Your Modern Decor
Features Cloud-Shaped Tummy Time Pillow For Newborns With A Plush Cloud-like Minky Surface On One Side And A Fun Star Printed Surface On The Other
Size (inches): 36l x 36w x 19h; (cm): 91l x 91w x 48h - PVC-Free, Phthalate-Free - Ages 0+
